Name: KanekoaTheGreat
Text: CNBC's Squawk Box discussed Elon Musk's Tesla compensation package when it was first announced in January 2018:  @RayDalio: "I think it's fabulous. The man is Tesla. I mean, it's his dream. He built the dream... The question is, what are his incentives? ...I think it ties them together."  @andrewrsorkin: "This is the ultimate skin in the game... I would argue it's about as shareholder-friendly as you'd get."   @jimcramer: "I didn't like it. I loved it. Because you know what? I would double what he gets if he makes that much money for people. And I wish that everyone would take that. I know there was a discussion. I thought that was a great piece. Holy cow. Because what it really did present you was here's a man of conviction."  @andrewrsorkin: "I asked him what do you need this money for? Because he always says he's not incentivized by money. And his answer was, he said, 'Look, I want to help humanity pursue this multi-planetary system. Meaning he wants us all to live on Mars. And he said that requires a certain amount of capital. And for his sake, if it works, it may go towards that, which may go towards all of us."  @elonmusk
